Description: Blue/green glazed composition figure of Thoth depicted as a man with the head of an ibis; with a back-pillar and rectangular base.
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: Dr Joseph John Acworth
Curator's comments: Published in: Regulski, I. (ed.), 2022. Hieroglyphs: unlocking ancient Egypt, pp. 222-3
Exhibition history: 2022-2023 13 Oct-19 Feb, London, BM, Hieroglyphs: unlocking ancient Egypt
Acquisition name: Donated by: Mrs Marion Whiteford Acworth JP
